description: This Alexa skill takes in any word or sentence and returns the reverse of it. For instance, if you say "Alexa, ask reverse geek to reverse cartwheel". Alexa will reply "The reverse of cartwheel is: leehwtrac" or if you say "Alexa, ask reverse geek to reverse Johnny Bravo is  my favorite". Alexa will reply: "The reverse of Johnny Bravo is my favorite is: etirovaf ym si ovarB ynnhoJ"
exampleInteractions: Alexa, tell reverse geek to reverse Johnny Bravo
Alexa, ask reverse geek to  get the inverse of Johnny Bravo
Alexa, ask reverse geek to  what is the reverse of Johnny Bravo
name: reverse geek
shortDescription: This Alexa skill takes in any word or sentence and returns the reverse of it.
